original_text: Wherefore, when I came, was there no man? when I called, was there none to answer? Is my hand shortened at all, that it cannot redeem? or have I no power to deliver? behold, at my rebuke I dry up the sea, I make the rivers a wilderness: their fish stinketh, because there is no water, and dieth for thirst.
korean_text: 내가 왔어도 사람이 없었으며 내가 불러도 대답하는 자가 없었음은 어찌 됨이냐 내 손이 어찌 짧아 구속하지 못하겠느냐 내게 어찌 건질 능력이 없겠느냐 보라 내가 꾸짖어 바다를 마르게 하며 강들을 사막이 되게 하며 물이 없어졌으므로 그 물고기들이 악취를 내며 갈하여 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: Wherefore, when I came, was there no man?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 이르렀을 때 사람이 없었느냐?

sentences.original_text: when I called, was there none to answer?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 불렀을 때 응답할 자가 없었느냐?

sentences.original_text: Is my hand shortened at all,
or have I no power to deliver?
behold, at my rebuke I dry up the sea,
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 내가 책망하면 바다를 마르게 하며

sentences.original_text: I make the rivers a wilderness:
their fish stinketh, because there is no water,
